text: USA/Mexico is an American noise rock supergroup from Austin, Texas, United States. == History == The band has their roots in the Austin, Texas noise rock scene, and features Butthole Surfers drummer, King Coffey, lead singer of Drain, Craig Clouse, and Nate Cross of Marriage on bass. On May 26, 2017, USA/Mexico released their debut album, Laredo. Their second album, Matamoros came out on March 23, 2019. ==Discography== * Laredo (2017) * Matamoros (2019) ==Members== * Nate Cross -- bass * King Coffey -- drums * Craig Clouse -- guitar and vocals ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Alternative rock groups from Texas Category:Musical groups established in 2015 Category:American noise rock music groups Category:Musical groups from Austin, Texas Category:Neo-psychedelia groups Category:Hardcore punk groups from Texas Category:Music of Austin, Texas Category:American sludge metal musical groups
title: USA/Mexico
